website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo Yoga 3 Pro has a breakthrough design, but requires careful consideration of the trade-offs required, particularly battery life.
pros: The Yoga 3 Pro adds a unique new hinge to be thinner and lighter than ever
The high-resolution screen looks fantastic, and the hybrid design still works great as a laptop
cons: This first outing with Intel's new Core M processor fails to impress, with mediocre performance and battery life

website_summaries.verdict: The Lenovo Yoga 3 Pro is a premium convertible-hybrid laptop that revamps the familiar Yoga line with a new hinge design, an efficient Intel Core M processor, and a super-slim new chassis.
pros: New watchband-style hinge looks great and offers better support for touch
New 180-degree option adds to multimode uses
cons: Performance of Core M CPU can't match standard Core i5 and Core i7 processors
Micro HDMI port requires adapter for use with standard HDMI
